parametrized_description: The company selects the number of large and small cruise ship trips to minimize (PollutionLarge × LargeTrips + PollutionSmall × SmallTrips) subject to LargeTrips ≤ MaxLargeTrips, SmallTrips ≥ MinSmallTripsPercentage × (LargeTrips + SmallTrips), and (CapacityLarge × LargeTrips + CapacitySmall × SmallTrips) ≥ RequiredCustomers.

CapacityLarge.description: Capacity of a large cruise ship in number of customers

CapacitySmall.description: Capacity of a small cruise ship in number of customers

PollutionLarge.description: Pollution produced by a large cruise ship trip

PollutionSmall.description: Pollution produced by a small cruise ship trip

MaxLargeTrips.description: Maximum number of large cruise ship trips

MinSmallTripsPercentage.description: Minimum proportion of total trips made by small cruise ships

RequiredCustomers.description: Required number of customers to transport

NumberLargeTrips.description: The number of large cruise ship trips

NumberSmallTrips.description: The number of small cruise ship trips

constraints.description: The number of large trips must not exceed MaxLargeTrips.
The number of small trips must be at least MinSmallTripsPercentage times the total number of trips (LargeTrips + SmallTrips).
The combined capacity of large and small trips must be at least RequiredCustomers (CapacityLarge × LargeTrips + CapacitySmall × SmallTrips ≥ RequiredCustomers).

objective.description: Minimize the total pollution, calculated as PollutionLarge × LargeTrips + PollutionSmall × SmallTrips.
